author: Shurikekat
body: I understand that burning a huge quantity of coins increases the value of Shiba inu. It actually sounds ideal however not feasible. I think the most realistic way of increasing its value is adoption. If merchants or businesses will start using its coin as payment, its demand increases and it will eventually decrease the volume of Shiba inu coins. As more people use this coin for transactions, its value can rise due to greater demand. The UAE's Ministry of Energy and Infrastructure has partnered with Shiba Inu so let's wait and see.
